message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with the problem of smoke segmentation in images and videos, which is a subfield of computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The proposed method uses deep learning techniques, specifically fully convolutional networks (FCN), which falls under the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the optimization of network parameters, which is related to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The proposed method involves the segmentation of smoke objects, which is a subfield of image segmentation, and hence, cs.GR (Graphics) is also a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper also discusses the application of the proposed method to videos, which falls under the sub-category of cs.MM (Multimedia).
